970.name: 8018-C2
970.Applications: Recommended for fine-grained steels used at low temperature (-60 to -80ºC ).Cryogenic and petrochemical industries. Stocking and distribution of liquid gas or products volatile.
970.Suitable_For:
Plates and tubes made out of fine grain steels, cold tough: 
NFA 35-207: A510PP1 – A550PP2 
NFA 36208: 3.5 Ni 285 ct 355 (12N14) 
DIN : 10Ni14 – 14Ni6 – 16Ni14 
ASTM : A203G D&E – A352GrLC3 – A334Gr3 – A350Gr LF3
